title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze the performance of a rocket engine and calculate its specific impulse. Include diagrams and calculations.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Study the combustion process in rocket engines. Analyze fuel efficiency and propose improvements.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a rocket nozzle for optimal performance. Include CAD drawings and performance calculations.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Quiz covering fundamental aerodynamic principles and fluid dynamics concepts.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze subsonic and supersonic flow patterns around an airfoil. Use computational tools.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Calculate aerodynamic heating for a re-entry vehicle. Propose thermal protection solutions.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structural component. Consider material selection and load requirements.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for a satellite mission. Include transfer orbit calculations.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Comprehensive exam covering spacecraft systems engineering principles.

title: Organic Compounds Lab
description: Laboratory assignment on synthesis and analysis of organic compounds.

title: Coordination Chemistry Report
description: Write a report on coordination compounds and their applications.

title: Thermodynamics Problem Set
description: Solve problems related to thermodynamic laws and their applications.

title: Elvish Translation
description: Translate a passage from English to Sindarin. Include grammatical analysis.

title: Diplomacy Case Study
description: Analyze a diplomatic event from Middle-earth history. Discuss strategies and outcomes.
